exercises.title: Hello world
exercises.description: Write a function that will return a string preceded by 'Hello'. This function will take a word or phrase as a string. You should protect against null values.

exercises.title: Add to array
exercises.description: Write a function that will take an array of strings and another string and add the string onto the array. You must protect against null values for both the array and the incoming string. Then return the modified array.
